t-tokenomics-desc:
• Liquidity Pool (LP): 60% – PancakeSwap LP, locked for at least 12 months (1 year)
• Presale: 24% – Allocation offered through official presale platforms such as GemPad / PinkSale
• Team: 8% – Locked for 12 months, then gradually released for long-term operations
• Marketing & Partnerships: 8% – Used for CEX listings, influencer marketing, community rewards, and promotional activities
• Burn: 0% – No fixed burn; focused on liquidity strength and long-term project growth
